description:
We design our Fulcrum PFDs to have an unobtrusive fit that conforms to a variety of body shapes. Our most full-featured version has a lots of pockets and tow-belt compatibility to make your multi-day trips easier and safer.

  • Front panels are split with a horizontal hinge point to fit male and female bodies of many shapes well
  • High waist back minimizes ride-up on kayak cockpits
  • Adjustable sides and shoulders
  • Zippered front pocket is big enough for large pocket cameras and has a key clip and mesh drainage panel on bottom. Zip mesh pocket on front holds energy bars, etc
  • Radio/GPS pocket with stretch mesh gusset for drainage and expandability and buckle closure for security
  • 2 stretch-neoprene side pockets with zippered closures
  • Knife attachment point on front
  • Strobe attachment point on back
  • Carabiner quick release point on shoulder
  • Reflective piping for night visibility
  • Tow-belt compatible. All pockets have side slots for threading a belt beneath pockets and their contents
  • XS/S fits chests 85-100cm, M/L fits chests 100-120cm, XL/XXL fits chests 120-130cm
name: MEC Fulcrum Guide PFD - Unisex
